summary: This mod simply adds a Blacksmith workbench, a sharpening wheel, and a candlehorn, to see what you\'re doing.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply adds a Blacksmith workbench, a Sharpening Wheel, and a Candlehorn (to see what you\'re doing) in the Windhelm\'s house, Hjerim.
For players like me, who love Hjerim but need to go out each time you need to upgrade a weapon/armor piece.
Simple, and efficiency.

[color=green]Note that the updates do more than simply add Blacksmith tools now.[/color]

[b]Updates :[/b]
v1.1 : Wall shelf*2 + Chest + Dibella statue + Candlehorn (light)
v1 : Workbench + Sharpening Wheel + Candlehorn (light)

[b]Other :[/b] 
- I used [url=file.php?id=7654]Realistic Lighting With Customization[/url], that\'s why my screenshots was dark and that\'s why I added some lights.
- Since v1.1, I removed the papers and the shelf, because they\'re useless exept for the quest, so please, 
[color=red]/!\\ don\'t apply this mod before you own the house or it\'ll break the quest. /!\\[/color]

It\'s just an .esp in the rar, but I recommend you to use NMM.


Feel free to propose what you would like in future updates.
author: 514Y32
